mapper.select: SELECT id, value, name, extension, parent_value FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = #{type} AND status = 1 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name, value FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = #{type} AND status = 1 ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT A.name AS parent_name, A.value AS parent_value, B.name AS child_name, B.value AS child_value FROM ( SELECT id, name, value FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = #{type} AND parent_value IS NULL AND status = 1 ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT id, parent_value, name, value FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = #{type} AND parent_value IS NOT NULL AND status = 1 ) B ON A.value = B.parent_value ORDER BY A.id ASC, B.id ASC
SELECT name, value FROM system_code WHERE code_type_id = #{type} AND status = 1 AND extension = #{filter} ORDER BY id ASC
